FIHealth - Region Sanity Check

This job executes the Sanity Check on each FIWARE Lab node. It will spawn parallel executions of one job per region (if there are resources to do that)

Project source code: https://github.com/telefonicaid/fiware-health/tree/master/fiware-region-sanity-tests
Documentation: https://github.com/telefonicaid/fiware-health/blob/master/fiware-region-sanity-tests/README.rst
